analysis.description:
Crowdsale.exchange (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#324-342) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-oldToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,0x0a6d9df476577C0D4A24EB50220fad007e444db8,oldTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#334-341)
	-newToken.transferFrom(0x0a6d9df476577C0D4A24EB50220fad007e444db8,msg.sender,oldTokenAmount * 105 / 40) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#341-342)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#343-359) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(0x0a6d9df476577C0D4A24EB50220fad007e444db8,msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#349-350)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#343-359):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFrom(0x0a6d9df476577C0D4A24EB50220fad007e444db8,msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#349-350)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#356-359)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#355)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol)

Crowdsale.canExchange should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#133-134)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c6c8e0c6b93b81c0ab3ca4e16eac96f02175f73.sol#5-6)
